title: Can You Cancel The Canceled? Post-COVID Architecture 2.25.21
itunes:title: Can You Cancel The Canceled? Post-COVID Architecture 2.25.21
description:
In episode 819, Jack and Miles are joined by super producer Anna Hossnieh to discuss the Johnson & Johnson vaccine, Georgia GOP continuing to try and suppress votes, CPAC coming, mainstream media stories, Biden's border facility, how covid will change our architecture, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. New analyses show Johnson & Johnson’s one-dose vaccine works well.
  2. Georgia GOP Will Ensure Election Integrity By Making Voting As Whites-Only As Possible
  3. New Omnibus Georgia Senate Proposal Would Severely Restrict Absentee Voting
  4. CPAC: America Uncanceled
  5. Will the Manhattan District Attorney Be the New Robert Mueller?
  6. No, Biden’s new border move isn’t like Trump’s ‘kids in cages’
  7. Has the Pandemic Transformed the Office Forever?
  8. Are More Car-Free Streets in N.Y.C.’s Future?
  9. How the Coronavirus Will Reshape Architecture
  10. WATCH: DangerDoom - Sofa King (Danger Mouse Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
